errorToSupport.message: We're having some trouble connecting to your server, please wait...
errorToSupport.response: Try reloading your page, if this does not work the node your server is on is probably under downtime.

errorToSupport.message: Running Installer Your server should be ready soon. please try again in a few minutes.
errorToSupport.response: Try reloading the page, if this still shows after an hour the server is stuck installing, you need to delete it and create a new one.
Try reloading your page, if this does not work the node your server is on is probably under downtime.

errorToSupport.message: another power action is currently being processed for this server, please try again later
errorToSupport.response: If your server is online and you can't stop it, click on the KILL button. This will force the panel to turn off your server. If you can't start it wait a few minutes and try again!

errorToSupport.message: Detected server process in a crashed state!
errorToSupport.response: Try checking in the startup tab if your startup file is valid and it exist. Check for any error in your code.

errorToSupport.message: There was an error while communicating with the machine running this server. This error has been logged, please try again.
errorToSupport.response: Try reloading your page, if this does not work the node your server is on is probably under downtime.
Try reloading your page, if this does not work the panel is probably under downtime.
Try reloading your page, if this does not work the panel is probably under downtime.

errorToSupport.message: This site can't provide a secure connection
errorToSupport.response: Try using the numeric IP of the node, you can find the numeric IP of the node from the #faq
